snippet: Uber, the San Francisco start-up that offers a smartphone app for summoning cars, is expanding its service to ice cream trucks in a one-day test in seven cities on Friday.
abstract: Uber, the San Francisco start-up that offers a smartphone app for summoning cars, is expanding its service to ice cream trucks in a one-day test in seven cities on Friday.

headline.main: Uber to Experiment With Ice Cream on Demand in 7 Cities
